Package mlsim.solution

Class GeneticAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • mlsim.solution.GeneticAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Crossover<GeneticAlgorithm>, Mutable<GeneticAlgorithm>
    public class GeneticAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
implements Crossover<GeneticAlgorithm>, Mutable<GeneticAlgorithm>
    Klasa reprezentuje ciąg binarny, który koduje pewne warunki, pozwala na wykonanie operacji crossover i mutate. This class is immutable.

      Creates a new genetic algorithm.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeneticAlgorithm

        public GeneticAlgorithm​(boolean[] binaryArray,
                        int ruleSize,
                        int preSize)
        Creates a new genetic algorithm.
        Parameters:
        ruleSize - Size of a single rule.
        preSize - Size of a rule's precondition.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        public int evaluate​(boolean[] flags)
        Given an array of flags, checks if it matches any condition. If so, returns its postcondition value, otherwise returns '-1' sentinel value.
        Parameters:
        flags - Flags to compare against each rule's precondition.
        Returns:
        A postcondition value or -1 if none matched..

      • asString

        public java.lang.String asString()
        Presents the genetic algorithm as string.
        Returns:
        Binary string.

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the amount of rules in this GA.
        Returns:
        Numbers of rules ie. size.

      • preSize

        public int preSize()
        Returns the size of precondition in bits. Example: 10011 Pre:100 Post:11 preSize() == 3 postSize() == 2
        Returns:
        Size in bits of precondition.

      • postSize

        public int postSize()
        Returns the size of postcondition in bits. Example: 10011 Pre:100 Post:11 preSize() == 3 postSize() == 2
        Returns:
        Size in bits of postcondition.
